entry.title: WIND WARNING , Powell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.9°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
